game.name: Slay the Spire
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, Adjustable Text Size, Custom Volume Controls, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Touch Only Option, Steam Cloud, Stats, Steam Leaderboards, Remote Play on Phone, Remote Play on Tablet, Remote Play on TV, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: We fused card games and roguelikes together to make the best single player deckbuilder we could. Craft a unique deck, encounter bizarre creatures, discover relics of immense power, and Slay the Spire!
game.shortDescriptionEn: We fused card games and roguelikes together to make the best single player deckbuilder we could. Craft a unique deck, encounter bizarre creatures, discover relics of immense power, and Slay the Spire!

reviewHighlights.text: 무한에 가까운 자유로운 덱빌딩. 온갖 기상천외한 콤보들. 로그라이크 덱빌딩 게임의 시작이자, 모든 후속작들의 지향점. 그리고 후속작들은 아직도 이 게임을 넘지 못했다.
카드게임, 턴제게임 뭐가 재밌지? 라고 생각했는데 이거 해보고 생각이 바뀌었습니다. 압긍 고트
